Question: Which characters are connected through past relationships in the context provided?
Options:
A. Roma
B. Sameer
C. Rama
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding the relationships between Roma, Sameer, and Suraj Prakash?
Options:
A. a) Roma is Sameer's ex-girlfriend.
B. b) Sameer and Suraj Prakash work together at the lifeguard resort.
C. c) Sameer puts Suraj Prakash on night shift duty.
D. d) Suraj Prakash is Roma's brother.
Answer: a) Roma is Sameer's ex-girlfriend. and b) Sameer and Suraj Prakash work together at the lifeguard resort. and c) Sameer puts Suraj Prakash on night shift duty.
